name: SalkSong
description: move with a/d or <-/->. Jump with [space] and jump again in the air for a double jump. press shift or leftclick to throw the needle. The needle may grab to hooks and drag you towards them.  While this is happening, you can jump to get to a high velocity while airborne. At the end of the drag, when at the position of the object, you may input any of the 8 directions to get a speed boost towards it. Press ctrl to perform a dive and hold it or press down while in the ground to slide and conserve that momentum. You can also walljump when hitting a wall while diving. This will also give you your double jump back.
